xmlText.p: First Period_1, Calgary, Frolik 9 (Backlund), 0:18. 2, Calgary, Giordano 10 (Backlund, Tkachuk), 7:24. 3, Colorado, MacKinnon 26 (Siemens, Barrie), 16:24. Penalties_None.
